name: Classical Chinese
description: This course examines Chinese classics and their English translations, such as the Book of Documents, the Analects of Confucius, the Mencius, the Dao De Jing, and other philosophical maxims, proverbial sayings, rhyming couplets, idioms and poems that still have impact on Chinese language and culture today.
prerequisites: LGGC64H3 or LGGC65H3 or a working knowledge of Modern Chinese and English
exclusions: (EAS206Y), EAS218H1, (EAS306Y), EAS358Y1, EAS455H1, EAS458H1, CHI311H5, CHI408H5, CHI409H5
